column5: ABOUT THE MAIN HOUSE:  The main house is a super cute, sunny, 3 bedroom 1 bath in Austin's South Congress neighborhood. The spacious open floor plan with adjoining living room, dining room/kitchen, set up makes it the perfect place to entertain. The kitchen has new stainless steel appliances with double door fridge, gas stovetop/oven, dishwasher, and all the cooking utensils (plates, silverware, pots, pans, dishes, glassware etc.) you'll need.   The main house is well appointed and has all the things you need for your stay (linens, towels, etc.) The sofa folds out to a queen sized bed and there is also a queen sized \
